The protagonist is Arthur Morgan.
Developed by Rockstar Games.
Based on a fantasy book series.
Features a monster hunter named Geralt.
CD Projekt Red's acclaimed series.
A hack-and-slash game series based on mythology.
The main character is Kratos.
The 2018 entry shifted the series to Norse myths.
A massive open-world fantasy RPG.
Developed by FromSoftware.
Features a world created with George R.R. Martin.
A futuristic sci-fi RPG.
Set in Night City.
Suffered from a difficult launch.
An open-world action game set in feudal Japan.
You play as a samurai named Jin Sakai.
Sucker Punch Productions developed this game.
A post-apocalyptic world with robot animals.
The main character is Aloy.
First game in a popular PlayStation series.
A PlayStation exclusive superhero game.
Features web-swinging around New York City.
Developed by Insomniac Games.
A narrative-driven survival horror game.
Follows characters Joel and Ellie.
Naughty Dog's masterpiece.
A popular Dungeons and Dragons based RPG.
The third game was a surprise hit in 2023.
Developed by Larian Studios.
A charming farming simulation game.
Inspired by the Harvest Moon series.
Created by a single developer.
A rogue-like game based on Greek myths.
Developed by Supergiant Games.
Won numerous awards for its art style and story.
A sandbox building and survival game.
Known for its blocky, pixelated world.
One of the best-selling video games of all time.
A popular battle royale game.
Known for its building mechanics.
Developed by Epic Games.
A long-running open-world crime series.
The fifth installment is one of the best-selling games.

A team-based hero shooter.

A popular free-to-play fantasy RPG.
Developed by miHoYo.
Known for its gacha mechanics and anime art style.
A long-running Nintendo series.
Follows the hero Link.
The recent 'Tears of the Kingdom' was a huge hit.
Nintendo's iconic platformer series.
The main character is a plumber.
Recent games include 'Odyssey' and 'Wonder'.
A critically acclaimed Metroidvania game.
Features a dark, insect-themed world.
Has a highly anticipated sequel called Silksong.
A popular first-person shooter series.
Known for its military themes.
The 'Modern Warfare' sub-series is very famous.
A first-person shooter series known for large-scale battles.
Features a destructible environment.
Main rival to Call of Duty.
A tactical hero shooter from Riot Games.
Features a 5v5 team-based gameplay.
Developed by the same company as League of Legends.
A Multiplayer Online Battle Arena game.
One of the biggest esports titles in the world.
Often abbreviated as LoL.
A rival MOBA to League of Legends.
The name is an acronym for Defense of the Ancients.
Developed by Valve.
A sci-fi RPG from Obsidian Entertainment.
Seen as a spiritual successor to Fallout New Vegas.
Released in 2019.
A massive space exploration RPG.
Developed by Bethesda Game Studios.
Released as an Xbox and PC exclusive.
A popular action RPG series.
Known for its loot-based gameplay.
The fourth installment was released in 2023.
A long-running survival horror series.
Known for its zombie-like creatures.
The 'Village' and '4 Remake' games were recent hits.
A classic JRPG series.
Known for its grand stories and turn-based combat.
The 'VII Remake' was released in parts.
An action-adventure series with a historical setting.
Players control an assassin in different time periods.
Recent entries include 'Valhalla' and 'Mirage'.
A sci-fi subgenre of fiction and games.
Often features a dystopian future with advanced technology.
The game '2077' is a prime example.
A space opera RPG series.
Players create a custom character named Commander Shepard.
Known for its deep lore and character relationships.
A unique game by Hideo Kojima.
Players traverse a post-apocalyptic United States.
The genre is often described as a 'strand game'.
A cooperative only platformer game.
You play as two parents who are turned into dolls.
Won Game of the Year in 2021.
A game development studio.
Created the 'Spyro' and 'Ratchet & Clank' series.
Known for their recent 'Spider-Man' games.
A handheld gaming computer.
Created by Valve.
Allows you to play your PC games on the go.
A third-person shooter series.
Known for its chainsaw bayonets and cover system.
Originally an Xbox exclusive.
A life simulation game.
Players create and control virtual people.
Known for its many expansion packs.
A social simulation video game series.
Players live in a village with anthropomorphic animals.
The 'New Horizons' installment was a huge hit.
A media franchise centered on fictional creatures.
The goal is to catch, train, and battle them.
Recent games include 'Scarlet' and 'Violet'.
An action RPG series by Capcom.
Players hunt and defeat large monsters.
The 'World' and 'Rise' installments are very popular.
A JRPG series and a spin-off of the Shin Megami Tensei series.
Players manage social links and dungeon crawling.
Known for its stylish art and music.
A crossover fighting game series by Nintendo.
Features characters from many different franchises.
The ultimate edition is available on the Switch.

A game genre where players fight to be the last one standing.
Examples include 'Fortnite' and 'Apex Legends'.
Often involves a shrinking play area.

Examples include 'Grand Theft Auto' and 'The Witcher 3'.
